short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension removes the recommendation section in the youtube. You can use youtube only for searching the video that you need.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension serves to eliminate the recommendation section on YouTube, providing users with a streamlined experience focused solely on searching for specific videos. By removing distractions like suggested content, the extension allows individuals to use YouTube with a primary focus on finding the exact videos they are looking for without being influenced by recommendations.

As we continue to develop and update this extension, our goal is to expand its functionality beyond YouTube. In the forthcoming updates, we plan to incorporate support for additional websites, enhancing the user's ability to tailor their online experience across various platforms. Stay tuned for upcoming features and improvements as we strive to provide an even more versatile and personalized browsing experience for our users.
